page.title: 03FORTY YEARS PEACE?
page.content: ON 8th MAY 1985 WE CELEBRATED THE FORTIETH ANNIVERSARY OF V.E.DAY. V.E. STANDS FOR VICTORY IN EUROPE. I DO NOT REMEMBER THE WAR BUT MY GRANDMOTHER AND GRANDFATHER DO. IN 1982 THERE WAS A WAR IN THE FALKLAND ISLANDS BETWEEN BRITAIN AND ARGENTINIA. IN LEBANON THERE IS A WAR THAT HAS BEEN GOING ON FOR SEVERAL YEARS. IN THE LATE SIXTIES AMERICA WAS AT WAR WITH VIETNAM WHERE A LOT A AMERICANS AND VIETNAMESE WERE KILLED. IN ETHIOPIA THERE ARE THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE STARVING BECAUSE THE CROPS HAVE FAILED DUE TO LACK OF WATER. MANY COUNTRIES HAVE SENT FOOD TO HELP FEED THE HUNGRY PEOPLE AND ON SATURAY JULY 11TH A CONCERT OF POP MUSIC WAS HELD WHICH WAS TELEVISED ALL OVER THE WORLD AND IT RAISED MANY MILLIONS OF POUNDS TO SEND TO ETHIOPIA.
